## Service.boot() method

Lifecycle method: boot

Signature:

```typescript
/** @virtual */
boot?(app: Framework): Promise<any>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                      | Description                            |
| --------- | ----------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------- |
| app       | [Framework](/api/bud-framework/framework) | [Framework](//bud-framework/framework) |

Returns:

Promise&lt;any&gt;

## Remarks

`boot` is called once all services are registered. It should be safe for Services to reference one another.
